title: Analysis of Trump's State of the Union address
shortDescription: USA TODAY's Washington Bureau Chief Susan Page takes a closer look at President Trump's 2026 State of the Union address.

title: 'He's enriching himself.' Democrats respond to State of the Union
shortDescription: Virginia Gov. Abigail Spanberger delivered the Democrats’ rebuttal to Trump’s take on the nation as it celebrates its 250th anniversary.

title: Protests target Trump before State of the Union
shortDescription: Two major protests, the State of the Swamp and the People's State of the Union, criticized President Donald Trump during his State of the Union.

title: Ilhan Omar shouts at Trump in the middle of SOTU address
shortDescription: Republicans stood and cheered while Democrats remained seated when Trump said the government should prioritize American citizens, not immigrants.

title: Buckle up. Trump's combative State of the Union signals storms ahead
shortDescription: The split-in-half audience − one side standing and cheering, the other sitting on their hands − was a portrait of the nation’s political divide.

title: Trump announces 'War on Fraud'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced a "War on Fraud" during his State of the Union address, saying it'd be spearheaded by Vice President JD Vance.

title: Democrat in Spanish rebuttal urges Americans to vote in midterms
shortDescription: Shortly after President Donald Trump’s State of the Union speech, Sen. Alex Padilla, D-California, issued his own rebuttal in Spanish.

title: Ilhan Omar yells 'you're a liar' at Trump during State of the Union
shortDescription: "That's a lie and you're a liar," U.S. Rep. Ilhan Omar, D-Minnesota, who is of Somali descent, yelled as Trump made the comments about fraud in Minnesota.

title: 'Heated Rivalry' between hockey fans after Trump call to men's team
shortDescription: A phone call between President Donald Trump and the Olympic gold-medal winning US men's hockey team has sparked a hot political debate in America.

title: Trump touts tax cuts in SOTU speech
shortDescription: President Donald Trump touted acheivements Republicans made with tax cuts during his State of the Union 2026 speech.

title: Here's how long Trump spoke in record-breaking State of the Union
shortDescription: President Donald Trump broke the record for the longest State of the Union address. He warned it would be long. How long did he talk for?

title: Trump talks Iran during State of the Union
shortDescription: President Trump said Iran is attempting to restart its nuclear program during his State of the Union address.

title: 6 key moments from Trump's 2026 State of the Union address
shortDescription: Some of the night's most explosive moments, including a sign about apes and an appearance by a group of “winning” Americans, have gone viral.

title: See Democrats protest at Trump's State of the Union
shortDescription: Democrats made their voices heard as President Trump delivered his State of the Union speech Tuesday.

title: Trump shades Nancy Pelosi during speech
shortDescription: President Donald Trump targeted Nancy Pelosi during his State of the Union address while pushing Congress to pass the "Stop Insider Trading Act."

title: What 8 wars is Trump referring to? He touted the inflated figure at SOTU
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he ended 8 wars during his State of the Union address. What wars is he referring to? See the fact check.

title: Trump scolds Democrats for high prices
shortDescription: President Donald Trump blamed Democrats for high prices during his State of the Union address, saying "you caused the problem."

title: See Barron and Ivanka Trump with family at State of the Union 2026
shortDescription: Members of President Trump's imediate family attended the State of the Union Tuesday including Barron, Ivanka, Melania, Tiffany, Eric and Donald jr.

title: Trump addresses tariffs ruling during SOTU
shortDescription: President Trump called the Supreme Court's decision on tariffs an "unfortunate ruling" during his State of the Union address.

title: Trump awards US men's hockey team
shortDescription: President Trump announced that he will present the U.S. men's hockey team goalie the Medal of Freedom during the State of the Union.

title: Democratic congressman removed from State of the Union over 'apes' sign
shortDescription: Rep. Al Green held a sign that read: "Black people aren't apes" at the 2026 State of the Union.

title: Congressman escorted out during SOTU
shortDescription: Rep. Al Green held a sign that read "Black people aren't apes" as President Trump walked in the chamber to deliver his State of the Union address.

title: Melania Trump wears suit at State of the Union
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump, in a dark suit and heels, chose not to break from tradition with a simple fashion choice at the State of the Union address.

title: Barron Trump makes first public appearance since father's inauguration
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's youngest son rarely makes a public appearance with his parents, but he is in attendance at SOTU. How tall is Barron Trump?

title: Melania Trump attends the State of the Union: See photos
shortDescription: Melania Trump attended President Trump's first State of the Union of his second term Tuesday.

title: Which Supreme Court justices are attending Trump's State of the Union?
shortDescription: Just days after the tariff ruling, these members of the Supreme Court didn't attend President Donald Trump's speech before Congress
